EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email alert template invitation to the Survey: Dreamforce

EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Dreamforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(Contact.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'https://timbasurveys.na31.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a0n6g000000CmhrAAG&cId='+Contact.Id+'&case_id='+Case.Id+'&wf=yes','https://timbasurveys.na31.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a0n6g000000CmhrAAG&cId='+Contact.Id+'&wf=yes'),'')}
